cast.original_title: Before the Devil Knows You're Dead
cast.overview: When two brothers organize the robbery of their parents' jewelry store, the job goes horribly wrong, triggering a series of events that send them and their family hurtling towards a shattering climax.
cast.title: Before the Devil Knows You're Dead

details.biography: Jordan Gelber is an American actor and singer. He has performed on Broadway in the musical Avenue Q, in All My Sons and in Elf the Musical, among other shows. He has also performed in many off-Broadway productions. He has a recurring role in the CBS TV show Elementary and in other television shows.
details.name: Jordan Gelber
details.place_of_birth: Riverdale, The Bronx, New York City, New York, USA
